{{velocity}} $!xwiki.ssx.use('Code.NewsletterSheet')## ## check if the model is specified #if("$!request.error" == 'modelmissing') {{error}}$msg.get('newsletter.missingmodel'){{/error}} #end #if($context.action == 'view') ## check if the user is already subscribed to this newsletter #set($userProfile = $xwiki.getDocument($context.user)) #set($subscriptionObj = $userProfile.getObject('Code.SubscriptionClass', 'newsletter', $doc.fullName)) #set($subscribeLabel = 'subscribe') #if($subscriptionObj && "$!subscriptionObj.getProperty('unsubscriptionDate').value" == '') #set($subscribeLabel = 'unsubscribe') #end (%id="newsletter-actions"%)((( (%class="buttonwrapper"%)((((%class="button"%)[[$msg.get("newsletter.${subscribeLabel}")>>LettreInformation.ManageSubscription?newsletter=$doc.fullName&subscriptionAction=${subscribeLabel}]]))) #if($hasAdmin || $xwiki.getUser().isUserInGroup('xwiki:XWiki.LettreInfoGroup')) (%class="buttonwrapper"%)((((%class="button"%)[[$msg.get('newsletter.createInstance')>>LettreInformation.CreateNewsletterInstance?newsletter=$doc.fullName]]))) #end ))) #end #set($currentUser = $xwiki.getUser($context.user)) ; $msg.get('newsletter.description') : $doc.display('description') #if($context.action == 'inline') ; $msg.get('newsletter.disclaimer') : $doc.display('disclaimer') #end #if($currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup') || $currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.LettreInfoGroup')) ; $msg.get('newsletter.model') : $doc.display('model') #end ; $msg.get('newsletter.frequency') : $doc.display('frequency')
#if($context.action == 'view') ## Statistics ## total number of subscriptions (count only active users that have not unsubscribed) #set($fromClause = ",BaseObject user, BaseObject obj, StringProperty newsletter, IntegerProperty active") #set($whereClause = "where doc.space='XWiki' and user.className='XWiki.XWikiUsers' and user.name=doc.fullName and obj.className='Code.SubscriptionClass' and obj.name=doc.fullName and newsletter.id.id=obj.id and newsletter.name='newsletter' and newsletter.value='$doc.fullName' and active.id.id=user.id and active.name='active' and active.value='1'") #if($currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup') || $currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.LettreInfoGroup')) #set($unsubscribeClause = "${fromClause}, DateProperty unsubDate $whereClause and unsubDate.id.id=obj.id.id and unsubDate.name='unsubscriptionDate' and unsubDate.value<>''") ##set($totalNb = $xwiki.countDocuments("$fromClause $whereClause and doc.fullName not in (select doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc ${unsubscribeClause})")) ##$msg.get('newsletter.totalNumber'): $totalNb #end ## Get the latest invoiced instances: all newsletter instances with this newsletter as parent #set($invoicesFrom = ", BaseObject obj, DateProperty invoiceDate") #set($invoicesWhere = "where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='Code.NewsletterInstanceClass' and doc.parent='$doc.fullName' and invoiceDate.id.id=obj.id and invoiceDate.name='invoiceDate' and invoiceDate.value<>''") #if($hasAdmin) ##set($invoices = $xwiki.searchDocuments("${invoicesFrom} ${invoicesWhere} order by invoiceDate.value desc", 5, 0)) #else ##set($invoices = $xwiki.searchDocuments("${invoicesFrom}, IntegerProperty published ${invoicesWhere} and published.id.id=obj.id and published.name='published' and published.value='1' order by invoiceDate.value desc", 5, 0)) #end #if($invoices.size() > 0) #set($latestInvoicedDoc = $invoices.get(0)) #set($latestInvoice = $xwiki.getDocument($latestInvoicedDoc).getObject('Code.NewsletterInstanceClass').getProperty('invoiceDate').value) #if("$!latestInvoice" != "" && $currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup') || $currentUser.isUserInGroup('XWiki.LettreInfoGroup')) ## ## Subscriptions for the latest invoice #if("$!doc.getObject('Code.NewsletterClass').getProperty('latestInvoicesSent').value" == '') #set($latestInvoicesSent = 0) #else #set($latestInvoicesSent = $!doc.getObject('Code.NewsletterClass').getProperty('latestInvoicesSent').value) #end $msg.get('newsletter.subscriptionsBefore'): $latestInvoicesSent ## ## Subscriptions after the latest invoice : all users that have subscribed to the newsletter ## after the latest invoice has been sent, but have not unsubscribed ## #set($unsubscriptionsAfterHql = "${unsubscribeClause} and unsubDate.value >= '$latestInvoice'") ##set($subscriptionsAfter = $xwiki.countDocuments("${fromClause}, DateProperty subscriptionDate $whereClause and subscriptionDate.id.id=obj.id.id and subscriptionDate.name='subscriptionDate' and subscriptionDate.value > '$latestInvoice' and doc.fullName not in (select doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc ${unsubscriptionsAfterHql})")) $msg.get('newsletter.subscriptionsAfter'): $subscriptionsAfter ## Unsubscriptions after the latest invoice ##set($unsubscriptionsAfter = $xwiki.countDocuments(${unsubscriptionsAfterHql})) $msg.get('newsletter.unsubscriptionsAfter'): $unsubscriptionsAfter #end ==$msg.get('newsletter.invoices')== #set($collist = ["invoiceDate", "doc.title"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.title" : { "type" : "text" , "size" : 30, "link" : "view"}, "invoiceDate" : { "type" : "date" } }) #set($options = { "resultPage": 'Code.InvoicesResults', "translationPrefix" : "newsletter.invoices.", "extraParams" : "newsletter=$doc.fullName", "selectedColumn" : "invoiceDate", "defaultOrder" : "desc", "rowCount": 15 }) #livetable("invoicedocs" $collist $colprops $options) #end
